transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Pradeep ji Ujjwal baat kar raha tha kaise ho aap?
Customer: Bahut badhiya sir kaise hain?
Executive: Bas badhiya badhiya aapne phone aaya tha main chuttiyon pe ghar pe tha to uthaya nahi tha.
Sir thoda sa na aapka catalog score increase karana tha aur baki aapke baat hui thi mere manager se to aur bataiye wo sab service vagaira kaise chal rahi hai?
Customer: Pehle se thoda theek hai matlab utna bhi nahi matlab mota moti thoda theek hai but koi koi aur pehle se to kafi pehle se to sir maine matlab kafi wo kar diya tha na aapka matlab correction karwa diya tha us time.
Executive: Hmm aur thoda photo
Customer: Ha ji sir
Executive: Aur thoda theek karwa lijiye acha hum kya bole the export ka link export ka wo link nahi tha kya?
Executive: Export wala export karna chahte ho kya aap?
Customer: Hello Hello
Executive: Ha ji ha ji
Executive: Main keh raha export karna chahte hain kya aap?
Customer: Ha ha export karna chahte but usme to hum export wala jab kholte hain link khulta hi nahi wo package lena padta hai export ka alag rehta hai sir.
Customer: Wo alag rehta hai?
Executive: Ha ji ha ji
Customer: Achcha
Executive: Export ka aapka package alag alag hai.
Executive: Kahiyega to bata du export ka agar aap dekh rahe ho to.
Customer: Ha ji
Executive: Kya bol rahe hain? keh rahe hain sir export ka aap dekh rahe hain to kahiyega to main aapko export ke product ke bare mein bata du.
Customer: Nahi abhi to main socha ki isi mein hai main kholne pehle kholta tha to aa jata tha.
Executive: Nahi ispe nahi aata na export ka wo thoda sa alag aata hai expensive ho jata hai na product thoda sa.
Customer: To shuru mein to liye the pichli baar to sara US vagaira ka aata tha.
Executive: Nahi usse aap by lead consume nahi kar sakte kabhi bhi nahi aap consume kar sakte sir export wali by lead.
Customer: Achcha
Executive: Ha ha export karna sir alag rehta hai na totally alag product hai to uski by lead to mere hisab se aap kabhi consume hoti nahi hogi wo matlab dikha deta raha hoga aapko by lead ki ye ye by lead hai lekin
Executive: Theek hai abhi kya karna hai ab kya karna hai bataiye na
Customer: Main aap keh rahe the jaise aapka ye hai wo kya kehte hain cotton bath towel hai theek iska size vagaira GSM vagaira thoda sa bata dete aur thodi si mapping sahi kar lijiye aapke product ki jo mapping error udhar ho rakhi hai second half mein ek baar second half mein karenge kya call?
Customer: Second half pe aur jaise aapke bath towel aur towel out of stock hai na usko bhi sahi karna hai.
Customer: Achcha
Executive: In sab pe thoda sa kaam karna hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai main aapko call dupehar ke baad zaroor karta hu.
Customer: Abhi abhi nahi ho payegi dupehar ke baad hi ho payega.
Executive: Nahi to main kahin par maine nikla hua hu main jo kahin kisi jagah mein bhi main ghuma raha hai hum aapko dupehar ke baad hi call karenge tab hum kar lenge.
Customer: Main aapko call karne wala bhi tha mil nahi raha tha number.
Executive: Achcha achcha number save kar lo na aap
Customer: Main pehle koi aur tha abhi aap logo ka change hota rehta hai na ab kitna number hai us jo main main to kab se aapke sath hu aap batao na aap nahi nahi aapke to abhi abhi manniy kaun the unke sab number the mere pass.
Executive: Theek hai abhi to main hi kar main nahi rehta hu to meri team se koi phone kar leta hai main to kafi time se aapse meri khayal se time se baat nahi ho rahi hai.
Customer: Achcha theek hai main aapko batata hu.
Executive: Ha maine abhi aapka ek do mahine matlab last month aapka maine wo bhi sahi kiya tha aap bata rahe the product ka ki thoda aapko mapping sahi karani hai wo bhi maine sahi kara tha last time jaise photo vagaira aur kafi product mein name vagaira upar niche nahi ho rakhe the aapke.
Customer: Theek hai main Ujjwal ji aapko call karta hu dupehar ke baad ha.
Executive: Chaliye dupehar ke baad aap kar lijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to increase catalog score.

- Export link not working.

- Bath towel and towel out of stock.

- Needs to correct product mapping.



Resolution:

- Executive explained export requires separate package.

- Executive offered to explain export product details.

- Executive confirmed to call after noon.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after noon.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, export, product, mapping, stock
